org.apache.ctakes.core.cc

Class SentenceTokensPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CasConsumer_ImplBase
      • org.apache.ctakes.core.cc.SentenceTokensPrinter

  • public class SentenceTokensPrinter
extends CasConsumer_ImplBase
    Saves the (base) tokens of each sentence on a separate line, separated by spaces
    Since:
    9/22/2014

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws ResourceInitializationException
        Checks for parameter OutputDirectory. If present then files will be saved, if not stdout is used.
        Throws:
        ResourceInitializationException - if parameter OutputDirectory has an invalid value

      • processCas

        public void processCas(CAS cas)
                throws ResourceProcessException
        Saves the (base) tokens of each sentence on a separate line, separated by spaces
        Throws:

      • outputSentenceTokens

        private void outputSentenceTokens(java.lang.String documentId,
                        java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> tokenizedSentences)
        Parameters:
        documentId - id of the document, used for output identification of the analyzed document
        tokenizedSentences - space-separated sentence tokens

      • printSentenceTokens

        private static void printSentenceTokens(java.lang.String documentId,
                       java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> tokenizedSentences)
        Prints the (base) tokens of each sentence on a separate line, separated by spaces, on standard output
        Parameters:
        documentId - id of the document, used for output identification of the analyzed document
        tokenizedSentences - space-separated sentence tokens

      • saveSentenceTokens

        private static void saveSentenceTokens(java.lang.String outputDirPath,
                      java.lang.String documentId,
                      java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> tokenizedSentences)
        Saves the (base) tokens of each sentence on a separate line, separated by spaces
        Parameters:
        outputDirPath - root output directory specified by parameter OutputDirectory
        documentId - id of the document, used for the output file name of the analyzed document
        tokenizedSentences - space-separated sentence tokens
